TopicTitle: In the Moon : Ecuador Sur Fault Line

Articles.Content:
I found a fault line in Kerbal Munar surface, its near in the equator so I called it \'Equador Sur Fault Line.\' My rover stepped on it, it\'s like a centimetre differences betwwen the two surfaces.

> 
> 

![%7Boption%7D](%7Boption%7D) See Attached, I also don\'t know how to insert picture spoliers.

![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif) :probe: :hailprobe: :hailprobe:

> 
> See Attached, I also don\'t know how to insert picture spoliers.

> 
> See Attached, I also don\'t know how to insert picture spoliers.

1. Click an image in your post to make it enlarged, then right-click and select 'Copy Image Address' (or whatever) from the context menu.
2. Edit your post, and paste an URL you\'ve just copied. Just like this: 

    http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/index.php?action=dlattach;topic=13194.0;attach=21215;image

3. Now select the pasted address and click 'Insert Image' in the post editing toolbar (you know where that button is, you\'ve already pressed it ![;)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)):

    [img=http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/index.php?action=dlattach;topic=13194.0;attach=21215;image]

4. Now, if you wish to make it a 'spoiler', select *an entire line* and press 'Spoiler' button:

[spoiler][img=http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/index.php?action=dlattach;topic=13194.0;attach=21215;image][/spoiler]

Result:

> ![index.php?action=dlattach;topic=13194.0;attach=21215;image](http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/index.php?action=dlattach;topic=13194.0;attach=21215;image)

5. This bug (and it *is* the bug!) has been already reported: [http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/index.php?topic=12525.0.](http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/index.php?topic=12525.0.) 

[mod]Topic locked. Link is posted in the original bug report one.[/mod]
